flavorText: Kavu emerged all across Dominaria, but the first and the strongest came from Yavimaya.

foreignData.flavorText: Kavus fanden sich überall in Dominaria, aber die ersten und stärksten kamen aus Yavimaya.
foreignData.name: Kavu-Kaiser
foreignData.text:
Alle Kavus verursachen Trampelschaden.
Immer wenn ein anderer Kavu ins Spiel kommt, lege eine +1/+1-Marke auf den Kavu-Kaiser.

foreignData.flavorText: Des kavrus apparurent sur tout Dominaria, mais les premiers et les plus forts venaient de la Yavimaya.
foreignData.name: Monarque kavru
foreignData.text: Tous les kavrus ont le piétinement.À chaque fois qu'un autre kavru arrive en jeu, mettez un marqueur +1/+1 sur le Monarque kavru.

name: Kavu Monarch
originalText:
All Kavu have trample.
Whenever another Kavu comes into play, put a +1/+1 counter on Kavu Monarch.

rulings.text: Does give itself Trample, but does not give itself a +1/+1 counter.

text:
Kavu creatures have trample.
Whenever another Kavu enters the battlefield, put a +1/+1 counter on Kavu Monarch.
